 Procurement Details
=====================

### Procurement Category
*CNST*

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Trade Agreements
The tender is open to contractors who are registered under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

Procurement Description
----------------------

The procurement is for the provision of building mechanical systems for the Moncton and Sussex NB Armouries.

Regions of Opportunity
----------------------

The tender is open to contractors who are able to deliver services in the province of New Brunswick.

Regions of Delivery
-------------------

The tender is for services to be delivered in the province of New Brunswick.

Contracting Entity
------------------

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
